channel.title: OWASP_2017_A04 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in OWASP_2017_A04 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: XML External Entity Attack
item.description: This technique takes advantage of a feature of XML to build documents dynamically at the time of processing. An XML message can either provide data explicitly or by pointing to an URI where the data exists. In the attack technique, external entities may replace the entity value with malicious data, alternate referrals or may compromise the security of the data the server/XML application has access to.
